3.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan and the Sunnah Regarding It

hadiths.text: Abdur-Rahman bin Sa'd bin 'Ammar bin Sa'd narrated (from his great-grandfather of the Messenger of Allah) that:In the Adhan of Bilal, the phrases were two by two, and in his Iqamah they were said once

chapter.eng-name: Saying The Phrases Of The Iqamah Once
